Prysmatic.Title: We’re building a more fair, open, and censorship-resistant Internet
Prysmatic.Subtitle: We are a passionate team of software engineers all around the world building the code behind the Ethereum blockchain

OurExpertise.Title: Our Expertise
OurExpertise.Mission: Prysmatic Labs currently builds technical infrastructure for the Ethereum blockchain. Our mission is to increase adoption through better tooling for users and developers of the Ethereum ecosystem through our expertise.
OurExpertise.PrysmProject: Our flagship project, Prysm, is a production client for Ethereum Serenity anyone can freely use to participate in consensus of the blockchain.
OurExpertise.IndustryStandards: We believe industry standards are a must for creating robust code. We build our technologies with the best-in-class tooling and design in mind.
OurExpertise.AccessOurWork: Our work is free, open source, and accessible everywhere. We believe in empowering developers to build a more fair and transparent Internet.

WhyEthereum.Belief: We are strong believers in Ethereum, a public blockchain that allows anyone to build unstoppable, censorship-resistant applications. On Ethereum, anyone can deploy software that controls digital value and is accessible around the world. Born in 2014, the Ethereum network houses over $20 billion worth of value today, hosting projects such as:
WhyEthereum.FinanceShift: We believe Ethereum represents a fundamental shift in how financial systems operate and are dedicated to its mission.

OurWork.Title: Our Work
OurWork.Ethereum: Our work on the Ethereum blockchain focuses on usability, security, and reliability as key pillars backed by extensive testing and carefully designed code.
OurWork.GoClient: A full-featured client for the Ethereum Serenity protocol, written in Go
OurWork.PrysmDescription: The Prysm project is a Go implementation of Ethereum Serenity protocol as detailed by its official specification. It contains a full beacon node implementation as well as a validator client for participating in blockchain consensus. Prysm utilizes the best-in-class tools for production servers and interprocess communication, using Google's gRPC library, BoltDB as an optimized, persistent, key-value store, and libp2p by Protocol Labs for all peer-to-peer networking.
OurWork.PublicTestnetSubtitle: A public test network for Ethereum Serenity
OurWork.PublicTestnetDescription: Launched in August 2020, the Medalla Test Network is a publicly accessible, mainnet scale network running multiple client implementations participating in Ethereum 2.0 consensus including Casper Proof of Stake.
OurWork.PublicTestnetParticipation: Anyone across the world can sync with the network, stake 32 test ETH, and participate in the protocol's consensus.
OurWork.SerenityApisSubtitle: Thoroughly-documented, schema-based API for Ethereum Serenity
OurWork.SerenityApisDescription: Ethereum Serenity APIs are a collection of schema-based, protobuf APIs aimed to standardize the efforts for a common API interface used to query information about the blockchain.
OurWork.SerenityApisForClients: The API is also used for validator clients to interact with a running node for the sake of consensus.

WhoWeAre.Title: Who We Are
WhoWeAre.Description: We are a team of individuals with a deep understanding of blockchain technology. With diverse backgrounds ranging from distributed systems to cloud computing, we emphasize a test-driven approach towards implementing the future of Ethereum.

JoinTestnet.Title: Join Our Public Ethereum Proof-of-Stake Testnet
JoinTestnet.Description: Participate as a validator in our public Ethereum Serenity test network today - sync with a full Proof-of-Stake Ethereum blockchain today and help us improve our work on the cutting-edge.

Donate.Title: Support Our Work
Donate.Description: The reason we're around today is due to incredible donations from the community to support development for the future of Ethereum. You can donate ETH or any tokens to our official ENS address prysmatic.eth or directly to 0x9B984D5a03980D8dc0a24506c968465424c81DbE.
